alert.note: Alert for Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 4:10PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Jefferson County through 500 PM MDT... At 409 PM MDT, trained weather spotters reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Westminster to 4 miles southeast of Morrison, or along a line extending from 12 miles northwest of Denver to 12 miles southwest of Denver. Movement was north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northern Lakewood, southern Arvada, western Westminster, southwestern Broomfield, Wheat Ridge and northeastern Golden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County
